item.title: Self Driving Car History
item.description: History This is a documentary on the seminal DARPA Grand Challenge, the beginning of the self-driving car history. (Udacity, 2018) Where are we now: 2018 This is the year of 2018. Even after years’ of hard working and innovation, the day that youâ€™ll be able to buy a self-driving car, or even ride in one, is a lot further out than you probably think. (Verge, 2018)
